text:
Extra 20cent for cashless.

Edit: Now I saw your reply. Anyway, u don't have to make your sentence to be so courteous. U are definitely right. We have a choice to buy or not to buy. So in your words, I would have my right to  asked why the 20cents extra. U replied in your words " nothing is free". U are also correct. Nothing is free, even asking a question is also not free. It's your business. Not mine. How u reply to customer is your problem. Not mine.

I went to use grab voucher worth 100$ (10$x10)
I had to make 10 orders. Shop staff assisted me to buy. They were very friendly.
